title: security-openid-connect-client-quickstart failing in native
body:
The native build for the quickstarts is broken due to port issues: in native, it's using prod mode and thus not the 8081 URL. I think we need a better fix than the one that has been used.

```
2022-05-23 03:07:05,630 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) security-openid-connect-client-quickstart 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT native (powered by Quarkus 999-SNAPSHOT) started in 0.185s. Listening on: http://0.0.0.0:8081/
2022-05-23 03:07:05,630 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Profile prod activated. 
2022-05-23 03:07:05,630 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Installed features: [cdi, oidc, oidc-client, oidc-client-reactive-filter, oidc-token-propagation-reactive, rest-client-reactive, resteasy-reactive, resteasy-reactive-jackson, security, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx]
Error:  WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurred
Error:  WARNING: Illegal reflective access by org.codehaus.groovy.vmplugin.v9.Java9 (file:/home/runner/.m2/repository/org/codehaus/groovy/groovy/3.0.9/groovy-3.0.9.jar) to constructor java.lang.AssertionError(java.lang.String)
Error:  WARNING: Please consider reporting this to the maintainers of org.codehaus.groovy.vmplugin.v9.Java9
Error:  WARNING: Use --illegal-access=warn to enable warnings of further illegal reflective access operations
Error:  WARNING: All illegal access operations will be denied in a future release
2022-05-23 03:07:07,827 ERROR [io.qua.ver.htt.run.QuarkusErrorHandler] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-0) HTTP Request to /frontend/user-name-with-oidc-client-token failed, error id: de270f0b-5f23-4427-94fb-190afb50f789-1: javax.ws.rs.ProcessingException: io.netty.channel.AbstractChannel$AnnotatedConnectException: Connection refused: localhost/127.0.0.1:8080
```
